Param.name: numOfInstances
Param.doc: Number of instances to get the intersect events

Body.Sql: SELECT COUNT(smt.event) as countEvents, smt.event, smt.event_description as description, smf.field_list FROM fw_state_machine_instance smi INNER JOIN fw_state_machine_transition smt ON (smt.id_start_state = smi.id_current_state) INNER JOIN fw_state_machine_state sms ON (sms.id = smt.id_end_state) LEFT OUTER JOIN fw_state_machine_form smf ON (smf.id = smt.id_form) WHERE smt.is_active = 1 AND smi.id in ({param->ids}) AND FIND_IN_SET('{param->role}', smt.role_list) GROUP BY smt.event, smt.event_description, smf.field_list HAVING COUNT(smt.event) = '{param->numOfInstances}' ORDER BY smt.event_description ASC
